title: Highest Champion Mastery Score?
body:
Interested to see who has/has seen impressive mastery score for an individual champ.

Currently the highest I've seen is "Mr Scarecrow" with his 250k Fiddlesticks score.

Anyone seen anything impressive/or higher? :)

replies.body:
I've played against that guy before, a few times.

He is fucking terrible at fiddlesticks.

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o4mbWch0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-11T09:07:16.047+0000)
>
> I've played against that guy before, a few times.
> 
> He is fucking terrible at fiddlesticks.

Proves why Champion Mastery is mostly useless. Someone can just spam that champion for 3 months in a row and get 300k+ easily without  the need to play well. ;') Rito plz

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o4mbWch0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-11T09:07:16.047+0000)
>
> I've played against that guy before, a few times.
> 
> He is fucking terrible at fiddlesticks.

LMAO.
Ishmael Tarok, played with him in solo queue, he has 1.8 mill on miss fortune

risingfromashe
love this guy check him out
i am garen on oce has about 1.2 mil on garen i think
yeah lol arkadata has 1.5 mil into yasuo
The highest champ mastery goes to Sheriff Buford on the NA server with over 2 million on mundo, across all accojnts annie bot is at about the same right now aswell.
Lel my {{champion:27}}  is one of the highest in Oce, would be double if teammates weren't so bad....

But that Mr scarecrow either instalocks in ranks or if he doesn't get his way he feeds and flames/rages the whole game I've been in 4 of his games 1 out of the 4 he got fiddle the 3 games spent flaming at team and raging on us banning fiddleâ€¦. so yeh thats impressive but doesn't deserve it
